scripts.serve:static: yarn concurrently "nodemon --ext js,vue --watch '.src/' --exec 'yarn gridsome build && yarn http-server ./dist/'"
scripts.dev: yarn link-there && yarn link-here && concurrently "cd ../../packages/pinelab-storefront && yarn watch" "gridsome develop"
scripts.dev:local: export VENDURE_ENV=local && yarn link-there && yarn link-here && concurrently "cd ../../packages/pinelab-storefront && yarn watch" "gridsome develop"
